articles.content:
S. Korean teachers on all-night strike 
    Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA)--20,000 members of the National Teachers Union (Jongyojo) in South Korea went on an all-night strike at Youido Park in Seoul on October 26, according to MBC from Seoul.
 They demanded a halt to the policy of commercializing education and the allocation of educational fund.
